text: Wild Mouse () is a 2017 Austrian comedy film directed by Josef Hader. It was selected to compete for the Golden Bear in the main competition section of the 67th Berlin International Film Festival. ==Cast== * Josef Hader as Georg * Pia Hierzegger as Johanna * Jörg Hartmann as Waller * Denis Moschitto as Sebastian * Georg Friedrich as Erich * Nora von Waldstätten as Redakteurin Fitz * Crina Semciuc as Nicoletta ==References== ==External links== * Category:2017 films Category:2017 comedy films Category:Austrian films Category:Austrian comedy films Category:German-language films
title: Wild Mouse (film)
